title: 25: No Such Thing As A Randy Rat In Polyester Pants
content: Dan (@schreiberland), James (@jamesharkin), Andy (@andrewhunterm), Anna (@nosuchthing), discuss rats wearing pants, pizzas on Venus, pillow fighting in the trenches and how to avoid incest in Iceland.
